posts.title: The Secrets of the United Irishmen
posts.content:
When researching Verses in the Sand, I discovered that the communication networks used by the United Irishmen were far more sophisticated than many realize.

Stay tuned as we dive deeper into the hidden codes used in 1798.

posts.title: Why Chronology Matters
posts.content: Irish history is often taught in fragments. My goal with the TikTok series and the novels is to string these fragments into a single, cohesive necklace of time.
